inclusion.criterion: Men at risk of prostate cancer and have been advised to have a prostate MRI.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fit for undergoing all study protocol procedures which includes an ultrasound guided biopsy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to tolerate general or spinal anesthesia.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent and to comply with the protocol.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have been treated using 5- alpha-reductase inhibitors at the time of study enrollment or 6 months prior to enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with previous history of prostate biopsy, prostate surgery or treatment for prostate cancer (interventions for benign prostatic hyperplasia/bladder outflow obstruction is acceptable).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a large prostate and bladder issues but no contraindications to MRI. He is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP.
